text:
<@U2H3TT8F2> is there an issue with multilingual page content permissions? Creating a webpage is fine without publish permissions, but we can't create a language variation without it.

We have contractors who we need to populate some multi-lingual content, and although the original English blog is already there, they cannot  create any of the translated content without an admin creating it for them.

I would suggest submitting this to the in-app support for this. Feel free to DM me the ticket number you get and I can also follow up internally and see what I can find. I dont believe this should be an issue but not 100% sure,

Hey <@U2H3TT8F2>, I spoke with support and they seem to have found the same issue on their test accounts. The support ticket number is:
#4429002
Awesome! I'll connect with the team internally on this as well.
